document_data.name: Ren Ferkins
document_data.mainbody: '''Ren Ferkins''' was the mayor of [[Dagger Falls]] around [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Ren was a very patriotic man.
document_data.History:
In 1479 DR, after an increase in raids by [[gnoll]]s, he discussed with the constable the option of hiring a group of [[Zhent]] mercenaries to clear the area.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Blades for Daggerdale|13}}

Later, Ren assembled the [[Zhentarim]] commander and an adventuring party hired by [[Kendar Morn]] for a meeting to decide the best option.
